Posts.Content: I also called AstraZenika regarding thinning hair as a side effect to Arimidex -- no help at all.  Said they had heard of thinning hair, but could not tell me how extensive it could be, etc.  I was extremely disappointed in their response.
Posts.Title: Side effects of Armidex

Posts.Content: I have only been talking Armidex for six months, in the last month I have been losing hair - is anyone aware of this being a side effect?
Posts.Title: Side effects of Armidex
